title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
description: When creating a new project in the software, there is a bug that needs to be addressed. The problem relates to the scrubbing of the bin directory.
OB: Currently, when creating a new project, there is no confirmation or notification provided regarding the ability to scrub the bin directory.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a new project is created, there should be a confirmation or notification that confirms the bin directory can be scrubbed. This confirmation should appear after the project creation is completed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the software.
2. Go to the 'File' menu and select 'New Project'.
3. Complete the project creation process, providing all necessary information.
4. After the project is created, there should be a confirmation message or notification indicating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
